meaning_mnemonic:
This word means <vocabulary>stapler</vocabulary>. It comes from the name of the company that first imported staplers into Japan: Hotchkiss! Here’s a mnemonic to help you remember it:

Ever given a <reading>hot kiss</reading> (ホッチキス) to a <vocabulary>stapler</vocabulary>? Imagine what that feels like, and you'll remember this word forever. Just keep in mind that sometimes it's written as ホチキス, but ホッチキス is more common.
